description: Reads from Dataflow Eventarc Pub/Sub Channel and writes to Big/Query
name: Dataflow Jobs data to Big/Query

parameters.name: subscription
parameters.helpText: Format: projects/project/subscriptions/subscription. The source Pub/Sub subscription to receive Eventarc events.
parameters.label: Pub/Sub Eventarc Subscription

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.helpText: Format: project.dataset. The BigQuery dataset to which to write Dataflow Jobs data.
parameters.label: BigQuery Dataset
